thread.title: Chipotle Revenue, Comparable Sales Rise in the Latest Quarter

author: Julie Jargon
title: Chipotle Revenue, Comparable Sales Rise in the Latest Quarter

organizations.name: latest quarter chipotle mexican grill inc.

text:
Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc. is planning to renovate restaurants, upgrade kitchen equipment and improve manager training in a bid to improve its bruised reputation with customers.
The company is searching for a new chief executive officer to replace Steve Ells, who plans to step down from leading the burrito chain he founded 25 years ago and to take the role of executive chairman once his replacement is hired.
